TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void EndPrintHandler(object o, EndPrintArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed EndPrintHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the EndPrintHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the EndPrintHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the EndPrintHandler is removed from the event.
